origin.description: Configures the `Access-Control-Allow-Origins` CORS header.  See [here for more detail.](https://github.com/expressjs/cors#configuration-options)

preflightContinue.description: Whether to pass the CORS preflight response to the next handler.

optionsSuccessStatus.description: Provides a status code to use for successful OPTIONS requests.

CorsOptions.description: Interface describing CORS options that can be set.

CustomOrigin.description: Set origin to a function implementing some custom logic. The function takes the request origin as the first parameter and a callback (which expects the signature err [object], allow [bool]) as the second.

LoadBalancingStrategy.description:
Determines the behavior when multiple URLs are used:

- `"NONE"`: No load balancing. All requests will be handled by the first   URL in the list until a network error is encountered. On network error,   arangojs will advance to using the next URL in the list.

- `"ONE_RANDOM"`: Randomly picks one URL from the list initially, then   behaves like `"NONE"`.

- `"ROUND_ROBIN"`: Every sequential request uses the next URL in the list.

retry.description: The number of times to retry the request.  Defaults to 3.

currentRetryAttempt.description: The number of retries already attempted.

retryDelay.description: The amount of time to initially delay the retry.  Defaults to 100.

instance.description: The instance of the axios object to which the interceptor is attached.

httpMethodsToRetry.description: The HTTP Methods that will be automatically retried. Defaults to ['GET','PUT','HEAD','OPTIONS','DELETE']

statusCodesToRetry.description: The HTTP response status codes that will automatically be retried. Defaults to: [[100, 199], [429, 429], [500, 599]]

onRetryAttempt.description: Function to invoke when a retry attempt is made.

shouldRetry.description: Function to invoke which determines if you should retry

noResponseRetries.description: When there is no response, the number of retries to attempt. Defaults to 2.

checkRetryAfter.description: Whether to check for 'Retry-After' header in response and use value as delay. Defaults to true.

maxRetryAfter.description: Max permitted Retry-After value (in ms) - rejects if greater. Defaults to 5 mins.

maxRetryDelay.description: Ceiling for calculated delay (in ms) - delay will not exceed this value.

EscapeCallback.description:
Escapes a string using HTML/XML escaping rules.

Returns the empty string for `null` or `undefined`.
